name: B. Cobb
statement:
You are given n integers a_1, a_2,
ldots, a_n and an integer k. Find the maximum value of i
cdot j - k
cdot (a_i | a_j) over all pairs (i, j) of integers with 1
le i < j
le n. Here, | is the bitwise OR operator.
